title: Five-Star Hong Kong Sanctuary within Citygate Outlets with 25-Metre Outdoor Pool & Executive Lounge
description:
A world of lavishness awaits at this five-star stay on Hong Kong's Lantau Island. Forming part of the cutting-edge Citygate Outlet development in Tung Chung that's home to more than 150 brands, this hotel is bursting with sophistication and charm.

Boasting a sleek 24-hour fitness centre and 25-metre outdoor pool, The Silveri Hong Kong-MGallery’s state-of-the-art facilities contrast strikingly with the surrounding mountains and turquoise waters. Savour bistro-style meals at THE ENCLAVE, watch expert mixologists craft premium cocktails at THE PAVILION and get your daily caffeine fix from FRESH cafe.
offer_address: 16 Tat Tung Road, Tung Chung, Lantau Island 999077, Hong Kong
